NAME
       pgmbentley - Bentleyize a PGM image


SYNOPSIS
       pgmbentley [pgmfile]


DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       pgmbentleyreads  a  PTM  image as input and performs the
       Bentley Effect, and writes a PGM image as output.

       The Bentley Effect is described in 'Beyond  Photography'
       by Holzmann, chapter 4, photo 4.  It's a vertical smear-
       ing based on brightness.


SEE ALSO
       pgmoil(1), ppmrelief(1), pgm(1)
